title: Beautiful 1BD/1BA - Center of Kendall/MIT/Cambridge
posting_body: ['Renovated, fully furnished 1BD/1BA unit for rent in Cambridge on Sciarappa Street available for a 1 year lease starting 8/1 or 9/1.', 'Rent is $2,865/mn with a fixed (guaranteed) monthly utility rate of $200.', 'Pet friendly.', 'Short term flexibility available (4 months or greater) for an elevated rent rate.', 'No Brokers Fee.', 'Superb location in the center of Kendall Square and the biotech/pharma community.', '5 min walk to MIT/Kendall Redline Station, 7 min walk to Lechmere Greenline station, 3 min walk to Cambridge Galleria Mall, 3 min walk to the newly built Timothy Toomey Park (for kids and dogs), 10 min walk to Cambridge Crossing.', '15 min bike or 20 min transit (walk + subway) to Harvard Square.', '10 min bike or 15 min transit to Mass General Hospital.', '20 min transit to Downtown.', 'Utilities include heating (no winter heating bill surprises), electricity, gas, water, internet/wifi, and a window AC unit.', 'Private off-street parking available if desired for an additional $290/mn.', 'Located steps from Kendall Square and its 150+ stores, bars, and restaurants including the Tatte, Café Luna, Mu Lan, Toscanini’s Ice Cream, Sumiao Hunan, Sweetgreen, Cava, Starbucks, Miracle of Science, Naco Taco, ArtBar, Lord Hobo Brewery and others.', '8 min walk to Star Market Grocery Store.', 'Brightly lit rooms with direct sunlight periodically throughout the day.', 'Small outdoor patio for use.', 'New laundry station in the basement (online 9/1).', 'No dishwasher.', 'If interested, please send a message!']
